text:
ここから
歩きよ
style: font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 16.76%;top: 38.26%;width: 16.49%;height: 0.54%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
霧が出るわ
離れないで
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 59.52%;top: 38.40%;width: 14.57%;height: 0.80%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
もう少しよ。
下に着いたら
霧が晴れるわ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 55.69%;top: 61.78%;width: 20.00%;height: 1.12%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
先に下に
着くわよ!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 20.27%;top: 64.22%;width: 15.00%;height: 0.72%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text: 無理ね!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 35.05%;top: 64.96%;width: 8.94%;height: 0.47%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
どう?
この階段で
私達に勝てる?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 18.24%;top: 66.76%;width: 15.00%;height: 0.81%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
どうかな、ミツ。
空港のショックが
残ってるみたい
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 27.39%;top: 71.17%;width: 18.51%;height: 0.78%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
やめて
おきなさい
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 6.33%;top: 72.91%;width: 12.66%;height: 0.89%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
ママの許可が必要?
可愛い娘ちゃん
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 48.67%;top: 72.75%;width: 20.11%;height: 0.60%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
下で
会いま
しょう!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 85.90%;top: 75.60%;width: 10.74%;height: 0.93%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
エミ、これって子供の頃の
一つ目小僧を思い出すわね。
私達にいつもイタズラして
楽しんでたの覚えてる?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 22.39%;top: 77.93%;width: 23.72%;height: 1.18%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 25%;

text:
えぇ、奴ら
捕まらないと
思ってたわね
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 20.05%;top: 80.01%;width: 11.17%;height: 0.83%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
うん、結局奴らを
川に叩き落として
遊んだけどね
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 25.27%;top: 81.71%;width: 20.32%;height: 0.87%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
父の願いには
反してたけどね
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 52.29%;top: 77.87%;width: 15.43%;height: 0.55%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
父のようにするのは
楽しくなかった。
家からあまり出して
くれないし
style: font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 49.84%;top: 81.72%;width: 18.51%;height: 0.88%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
子育てで１つ学んだのは
子供の意思はずっとは
抑えられないってこと
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 74.63%;top: 77.85%;width: 20.64%;height: 0.76%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
し…下で
待つのよ?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 5.16%;top: 90.42%;width: 14.47%;height: 0.80%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text: 気をつけて!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 12.39%;top: 91.22%;width: 13.40%;height: 0.62%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
どうして
あんなこと
言ったの?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 22.39%;top: 93.32%;width: 8.62%;height: 0.88%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
ゴメン。
旅路は長かったし
リラックスさせて
あげたかったの。
下で待ってるわよ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 75.27%;top: 93.38%;width: 20.64%;height: 1.65%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
これから
どうなるか
見ものだ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 2.07%;top: 96.71%;width: 10.43%;height: 1.14%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
サミュエル・
ウィリアムズ
考えが読めるわ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 67.93%;top: 96.15%;width: 18.51%;height: 0.71%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
新しい本のネタを
思いついたん
でしょ?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 64.20%;top: 96.84%;width: 15.11%;height: 1.07%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;

text:
いやいや
そんなことは
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 59.95%;top: 98.23%;width: 10.96%;height: 0.72%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 45%;
